snippet: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis wants the price of Premier League away tickets to be fixed at 10 pounds as a measure to combat rising matchday costs for fans that he believes could kill the atmosphere within top flight stadiums....

headline.main: Pulis Backs 10 Pound Tickets for Premier League Away Fans
headline.print_headline: Pulis Backs 10 Pound Tickets for Premier League Away Fans

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis wants the price of Premier League away tickets to be fixed at 10 pounds as a measure to combat rising matchday costs for fans that he believes could kill the atmosphere within top flight stadiums.

snippet: Chelsea manager Guus Hiddink says the intensity of the Premier League has increased since his first stint with the club in 2009 with all clubs now attracting big-name players across Europe....

headline.main: The Intensity of the Premier League Has Increased-Hiddink
headline.print_headline: The Intensity of the Premier League Has Increased-Hiddink

lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Guus Hiddink says the intensity of the Premier League has increased since his first stint with the club in 2009 with all clubs now attracting big-name players across Europe.

snippet: Manchester United's defensive tactics blunted Liverpool's prolific attack as England's two most illustrious teams toughed out a 0-0 draw in the Premier League on Monday....

headline.main: United Contains Liverpool in 0-0 Draw in Premier League
headline.print_headline: United Contains Liverpool in 0-0 Draw in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Manchester United's defensive tactics blunted Liverpool's prolific attack as England's two most illustrious teams toughed out a 0-0 draw in the Premier League on Monday.

snippet: Chelsea midfielder Ruben Loftus-Cheek has needed time to adapt to the physical nature of the Premier League after making his club debut last season, he was quoted as saying on Friday....

headline.main: Loftus-Cheek Adapting to Physical Demands of Premier League
headline.print_headline: Loftus-Cheek Adapting to Physical Demands of Premier League

lead_paragraph: Chelsea midfielder Ruben Loftus-Cheek has needed time to adapt to the physical nature of the Premier League after making his club debut last season, he was quoted as saying on Friday.

snippet: Burnley returned to the Premier League at the first attempt with a 1-0 home win over Queens Park Rangers securing promotion from the Championship and a minimum 100 million pounds windfall on Monday....

headline.main: Burnley Unlock Riches With Promotion to Premier League
headline.print_headline: Burnley Unlock Riches With Promotion to Premier League

lead_paragraph: Burnley returned to the Premier League at the first attempt with a 1-0 home win over Queens Park Rangers securing promotion from the Championship and a minimum 100 million pounds windfall on Monday.

snippet: Fingernails are being bitten to the quick by fans of Burnley, Middlesbrough and Brighton and Hove Albion as a three-way fight for promotion to the Premier League reaches its climax....

headline.main: Three-Way Fight for Premier League Promotion Nears Climax
headline.print_headline: Three-Way Fight for Premier League Promotion Nears Climax

lead_paragraph: Fingernails are being bitten to the quick by fans of Burnley, Middlesbrough and Brighton and Hove Albion as a three-way fight for promotion to the Premier League reaches its climax.

snippet: Sweden striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic could still thrive in the Premier League despite being nearly 35 years old, his national team manager Erik Hamren said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Ibrahimovic Could Thrive in Premier League, Says Sweden Coach
headline.print_headline: Ibrahimovic Could Thrive in Premier League, Says Sweden Coach

lead_paragraph: Sweden striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic could still thrive in the Premier League despite being nearly 35 years old, his national team manager Erik Hamren said on Tuesday.

snippet: Midfielder Mesut Ozil says Arsenal have a fight on their hands to overtake Leicester City at the top of the standings and win the Premier League after exiting two cup competitions in the space of four days....

headline.main: Ozil Urges Arsenal to Fight for Every Premier League Point
headline.print_headline: Ozil Urges Arsenal to Fight for Every Premier League Point

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Mesut Ozil says Arsenal have a fight on their hands to overtake Leicester City at the top of the standings and win the Premier League after exiting two cup competitions in the space of four days.

snippet: One of the most unpredictable Premier League seasons for years can be summed up by comparing pre-season odds to the numbers now at the halfway stage -- with Leicester City's title odds slashed from 5,000-1 to 14-1 after their stunning start....

headline.main: Halfway Odds Sum Up Crazy Premier League Season
headline.print_headline: Halfway Odds Sum Up Crazy Premier League Season

lead_paragraph: One of the most unpredictable Premier League seasons for years can be summed up by comparing pre-season odds to the numbers now at the halfway stage -- with Leicester City's title odds slashed from 5,000-1 to 14-1 after their stunning start.

snippet: Zlatan Ibrahimovic was back to his irrepressible, boastful best on Sunday as he joked about the landmark 25,000th Premier League goal that signalled a change in his fortunes....

headline.main: Irrepressible Zlatan Loves Scoring 25,000th Premier League Goal
headline.print_headline: Irrepressible Zlatan Loves Scoring 25,000th Premier League Goal

lead_paragraph: Zlatan Ibrahimovic was back to his irrepressible, boastful best on Sunday as he joked about the landmark 25,000th Premier League goal that signalled a change in his fortunes.
